page.title: 05The Dentists. Otford
page.content: In Otford we have two Dentists in the partnership. They each have one assistant and there is a secretary. There are 3000 patients in the whole practice (Private patients are less than 1%). Checkups are free and up to eighteen treatment is free also. The cheapest filling costs #3.30 and the most expensive is #11.00. The cheapest gold crown costs #33.00. Children go for check-ups every four months and adults every six months. The most commonly needed treatment is a filling and the method of anaesthesia preferred is the local anaesthetic. About 85% of patients require dentures. Materials needed to be stocked include silver fillings, amalgam,X-Ray files, instruments, cotton-wool, tissues, etc, with local anaesthetic and impression material.
